SEARCH
Package pegasus.pointer

Interface BasePointer<T>

Type Parameters:
T - The type of object this pointer references
All Superinterfaces:
Iterable<T>, Serializable
All Known Subinterfaces:
DoublePointer, IntPointer, LongPointer, ObjectPointer<T>
All Known Implementing Classes:
ArrayPointer, DoubleArrayPointer, IntArrayPointer, LongArrayPointer
public interface BasePointer<T> extends Iterable<T>, Serializable
The base interface for Pegasus pointers. Pointer can be used to allow the external manipulation of the underlying data via other APIs. Pointers can also be used as arrays, and have array-like features accessible in an object-oriented manner.
